<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Artifacts of Aroden](/Articles.aspx?ID=20)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 64

Dredge up relics of the past and priceless treasures left in the wake of the Last Azlanti's mysterious death.
name: Artifacts of Aroden
